## Field.DEFAULT\_VALUE property

To overwrite the default value which is set in \*\*Field\*\*, directly update the prototype.

Example:

```typescript
FieldImage.prototype.DEFAULT_VALUE = null;
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
DEFAULT_VALUE: T | null;
```
